description: Get the tip info about the latest block seen by chain

schema.description: Array of genesis parameters used to start each era on chain

networkid.description: Network ID used at various CLI identification to distinguish between Mainnet and other networks

epochlength.description: Number of slots in an epoch

slotlength.description: Duration of a single slot (in seconds)

maxlovelacesupply.description: Maximum smallest units (lovelaces) supply for the blockchain

systemstart.description: UNIX timestamp of the first block (genesis) on chain

activeslotcoeff.description: Active Slot Co-Efficient (f) - determines the _probability_ of number of slots in epoch that are expected to have blocks (so mainnet, this would be: 432000 * 0.05 = 21600 estimated blocks)

slotsperkesperiod.description: Number of slots that represent a single KES period (a unit used for validation of KES key evolutions)

maxkesrevolutions.description: Number of KES key evolutions that will automatically occur before a KES (hot) key is expired. This parameter is for security of a pool, in case an operator had access to his hot(online) machine compromised

securityparam.description: A unit (k) used to divide epochs to determine stability window (used in security checks like ensuring atleast 1 block was created in 3*k/f period, or to finalize next epoch's nonce at 4*k/f slots before end of epoch)

updatequorum.description: Number of BFT members that need to approve (via vote) a Protocol Update Proposal

alonzogenesis.description: A JSON dump of Alonzo Genesis

supply.description: Total Active Supply (sum of treasury funds, rewards, UTxOs, deposits and fees) for given epoch (in lovelaces)

reserves.description: Total Reserves yet to be unlocked on chain

schema.description: Array of detailed summary for each epoch

out_sum.description: Total output value across all transactions in epoch

fees.description: Total fees incurred by transactions in epoch

tx_count.description: Number of transactions submitted in epoch

blk_count.description: Number of blocks created in epoch

start_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch start

end_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch end

first_block_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch's first block

last_block_time.description: UNIX timestamp of the epoch's last block

active_stake.description: Total active stake in epoch stake snapshot (null for pre-Shelley epochs)

total_rewards.description: Total rewards earned in epoch (null for pre-Shelley epochs)

avg_blk_reward.description: Average block reward for epoch (null for pre-Shelley epochs)

description: Get the epoch information, all epochs if no epoch specified

parameters.name: _epoch_no
parameters.description: Epoch Number to fetch details for

schema.description: Epoch parameters (all fields nullable for pre-Shelley/Gougen epochs except first block hash)

min_fee_a.description: The 'a' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee

min_fee_b.description: The 'b' parameter to calculate the minimum transaction fee

max_bh_size.description: The maximum block header size (in bytes)

key_deposit.description: The amount (in lovelace) required for a deposit to register a stake address

pool_deposit.description: The amount (in lovelace) required for a deposit to register a stake pool

max_epoch.description: The maximum number of epochs in the future that a pool retirement is allowed to be scheduled for

optimal_pool_count.description: The optimal number of stake pools

influence.description: The pledge influence on pool rewards

decentralisation.description: The decentralisation parameter (1 fully centralised, 0 fully decentralised)

extra_entropy.description: The hash of 32-byte string of extra random-ness added into the protocol's entropy pool

min_utxo_value.description: The minimum value of a UTxO entry

nonce.description: The nonce value for this epoch

block_hash.description: The hash of the first block where these parameters are valid

cost_models.description: The per language cost model in JSON

price_mem.description: The per word cost of script memory usage

price_step.description: The cost of script execution step usage

max_tx_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single transaction

max_tx_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single transaction

max_block_ex_mem.description: The maximum number of execution memory allowed to be used in a single block

max_block_ex_steps.description: The maximum number of execution steps allowed to be used in a single block

collateral_percent.description: The percentage of the tx fee which must be provided as collateral when including non-native scripts

max_collateral_inputs.description: The maximum number of collateral inputs allowed in a transaction

description: Get a list of all transaction metalabels

requestBody.description: Serialised Cardano Transaction

x-code-samples.source:
# Assuming ${data} is a raw binary serialized transaction on the file-system.
# If using a CLI-generated tx file, please ensure to deserialise (using `xxd -p -r <<< $(jq .cborHex ${tx.signed}) > ${data}`) first before submitting.
curl -X POST \
    --header "Content-Type: application/cbor" \
    --data-binary @${data} https://api.koios.rest/api/v1/submittx

400.description: An error occured while submitting transaction.

description:
Get the list of all addresses holding a given asset

`Note - Due to cardano's UTxO design and usage from projects, asset to addresses map can be infinite. Thus, for a small subset of active projects with millions of transactions, these might end up with timeouts (HTTP code 504) on free layer. Such large-scale projects are free to subscribe to query layers to have a dedicated cache table for themselves served via Koios.`

parameters.name: _asset_policy
parameters.description: NFT Policy ID in hexadecimal format (hex)

parameters.name: _asset_name
parameters.description: NFT Name in hexadecimal format (hex)

200.description: Payment addresses currently holding the given NFT

schema.description: An array of payment addresses holding the given token

method.description: The Ogmios method to be called (see more details [here](#tag--Ogmios)) or browse examples tab

params.description: Any parameters relevant to the specific method to be called

blockHeight.description: Query the network’s highest block number.

genesisConfiguration.description: Query the genesis configuration of a given era.

epoch.description: Query the current epoch of the ledger.

eraStart.description: Query information regarding the beginning of the current ledger era.

eraSummaries.description: Query era bounds and slot parameters details, required for proper sloting arithmetic.

liveStakeDistribution.description: Query distribution of the stake across all known stake pools, relative to the total stake in the network.

proposedProtocolParameters.description: Query the last update proposal w.r.t. protocol parameters, if any.

StakePools.description: Query the list of all stake pool identifiers currently registered and active.

submitTransaction.description: Submit a signed and serialized transaction to the network.

evaluateTransaction.description: Evaluate execution units of scripts in a well-formed transaction.

requestBody.description: JSON-RPC 2.0 standard request body

200.description: Current tip of the chain, identified by a slot and a block header hash.

schema.description: Current tip of the chain, identified by a slot and a block header hash.

method.description: The Ogmios method that was called in the request

id.description: Block Hash (Blake2b 32-byte hash digest, encoded in base16)

400.description: The server cannot process the request due to invalid input

description:
Query the current tip of the Network.
We do support transparent forwarding for various methods from Ogmios, you can read about those here.
